ExceptionHandling¶

CommonExceptionHandler¶

class CommonExceptionHandler¶

Bases: object

A class for handling and logging custom exceptions to a file on the system.

static catch_exceptions(mod_name: str, fallback_return: Any = None)¶

A decorator for catching exceptions thrown by functions.

Parameters

  • mod_name – An identifier to indicate which mod it occurs in.

  • fallback_return – A value to return upon an exception being thrown.

Returns

A wrapped function.

static log_exception(mod_name: str, exception_message: str, exception: Exception = None) → bool¶

Log an exception with a custom message

Parameters

  • mod_name – The name of the mod logging the exception.

  • exception_message – A message to log

  • exception – The exception that was thrown.

Returns

True if successfully logged.

CommonStacktraceUtil¶

class CommonStacktraceUtil¶

Bases: object

Utilities for accessing the full stack trace of your application.

static current_stack(skip: int = 0) → Any¶

Retrieve the current stack

Parameters

skip – The number of lines to skip

Returns

A collection of the current stack.

static full_exception_info() → Union[type, Any, sims4communitylib.exceptions.common_stacktrace_utils.FullTraceback]¶

Like sys.exc_info, but includes the full traceback.

static get_full_stack_trace() → List[str]¶

Retrieve the full stacktrace from the current stack.

Returns

A collection of stack trace strings.
